subject: Skiing
Olympic Games (2010)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Ski racer Bode Miller, who split with the U.S. Ski Team two years ago to compete on his own, is expected to announce his intention to rejoin the team in Vancouver.
snippet: Ski racer Bode Miller, who split with the U.S. Ski Team two years ago to compete on his own, is expected to announce his intention to rejoin the team in Vancouver.
